hint.en: Current holding time of latch, settable to intervals of between 1 and 20 seconds.
hint.de: Haltezeit der Falle einstellbar von 1 bis 20 Sekunden

hint.en: Setting of current torque during travel of latch
hint.de: Die Einstellung des aktuellen Drehmoments während der Verriegelung

label.en: Torque of the latch is high (max.)
label.de: Das Drehmoment der Verriegelung ist hoch (max.)

label.en: Torque of the latch is medium
label.de: Das Drehmoment der Verriegelung ist mittel

label.en: Torque of the latch is low (min.)
label.de: Das Drehmoment der Verriegelung ist niedrig (min.)

hint.en: Status of lock: - 0 unknown - 1 open - 2 unlocked - 3 1x locked - 4 2x locked - 5 locked (end stop) - 6 multiple locking
Counter, how often latch was actuated
Counter, how often travel in „Unlocked“ direction
Counter, how often travel in „Locked“ direction
Setting of acoustic signals. lowbattery and error/alarm signals cannot be changed
hint.de: Einstellung der akustischen Signale. Niederbatterie und Fehler-/Alarmsignale können nicht geändert werden.

label.en: Acoustic signal only at the beginning of the lock travel
Acoustic signal when reaching the position of the event
label.de: Signal bei Erreichen der Position Falle

label.en: Acoustic signal when reaching the position Locked
label.de: Signal bei Erreichen der Position Verriegelt

label.en: Acoustic signal when reaching each end position

hint.en: Current setting of travel path at drive that is intended and/ or allowed to be travelled: - 1 Automatic / normal (travel according to teach-in run parameters) - 2 in case of multiple locking only one locking action - 3 motor travel from window tilt position is allowed (ABUS FCA3000)
Current setting of touch field function: - 1 all active - 2 only operating buttons active - 3 all inactive - 4 only latch pull inactive
Setting of current torque during travel of bolt: - 1 Automatic / normal (travel according to teach-in run parameters) - 2 maximum
